metaTags.metaTitle: Browser Isolation | Protect Users and Data
metaTags.metaDescription: Learn how Cloudflare's Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) secures data and users. Protect against zero-day threats. Deploy with or without a device client.

promotionalBanner.desktopText: What is Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) and what does it do? Read more in our Learning Center.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation
relatedBlades.subtitle: Internet-native Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
relatedBlades.copy:
- Layer additional threat defense and data protection controls across browsing activities
- Insulate local devices from malware by running all browser code on Cloudflare's global network
- Deliver a lightning-fast browsing experience for end users
relatedBlades.leftLink: [Try it out today! Experience a remote browser for yourself.](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/browser-isolation/experience/)

features.title: No performance sacrifice
features.description: Improve team productivity by delivering a fast, secure, and responsive user experience that feels just like local browsing.

features.title: Proactively mitigate threats
features.description: Reduce cyber risk by running browser code far away from local devices, preventing infection across known malicious, risky, and unknown sites.

features.title: Isolate within context
features.description: Improve tech efficiency by isolating resources conditionally - per app, per policy, for suspicious sites only, or with additional data loss controls.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named a Strong Performer
relatedBlades.copy: See why Cloudflare was named a Strong Performer in the 2022 Gartner Peer Insights "Voice of the Customer" report for Security Service Edge (SSE).
relatedBlades.subheadline: Reviewed by customers on Gartner Peer Insights

relatedBlades.title: Top use cases for RBI
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Protect against ransomware__ - Isolate browsing to halt ransomware attempts before they can spread or infect an internal network.
- __Thwart phishing attacks__ - Accidents happen, and people click. Help mitigate phishing impact by opening suspicious email links in an isolated browser.
- __Secure contractor access__ - Protect data that third-party users access on unmanaged devices. Isolate apps via a hyperlink without requiring software for end users.

relatedBlades.title: Threat and data protection features across full Zero Trust platform

relatedBlades.title: Tackle Zero Trust one step at a time

features.title: Easy to deploy
features.description: Set browser isolation policies with a simple drop-down action in Cloudflare's unified dashboard to reduce administrative burden.

features.title: Thoughtful, native integrations
features.description: Unlike other providers, Cloudflare's RBI is natively integrated with all in-line Zero Trust services to make it easier to layer and extend security controls.

features.title: RBI that's actually fast
features.description: Delight end users by keeping security invisible with Cloudflare's innovative Network Vector Rendering technology and hyper-low latency.

relatedBlades.title: How it works
relatedBlades.copy:
- A headless version of the Chromium browser runs all browser code on Cloudflare's global network, instead of on your endpoints.
- Unlike pixel pushing or DOM rendering, Cloudflare streams draw commands, which use less bandwidth and create a seamless user experience.
- Security patches for zero-day vulnerabilities are automatically deployed to remote browsers on Cloudflare's network.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation Threat Protection SVG

relatedBlades.sectionTitle: Add an additional layer of security

togglesTo.title: How it works
togglesTo.copy:
- A headless version of the Chromium browser runs all browser code on Cloudflare's global network, instead of on your endpoints.
- Unlike pixel pushing or DOM rendering, Cloudflare streams draw commands, which use less bandwidth and create a seamless user experience.
- Across any isolated page, build rules to prevent risky user actions within the browser, including restricting download, upload, copy-paste, keyboard input, and printing functionalities.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Browser Isolation Data Protection SVG

relatedBlades.quote: "We started using Cloudflare Zero Trust Services with Browser Isolation to help provide the best security for our customers' data and protect employees from malware. It worked so well I forgot it was on."

quoteCarousel.quote: "Phishing is the fastest growing attack vector against DroneDeploy, and we're targeted daily. Remote Browser provides an invisible protective layer to prevent entire classes of exploits and data exfiltration, with zero impact to business productivity."
